name: Meowmeow Space Station
description:
In this project, we designed an "impossible space" that requires VR equipment to experience - Meowmeow Space Station.  This is a different kind of space station, in this game, the player will The player will be the owner of Meowmeow, who runs a farm in space. 

The appearance of the space station is very sci-fi, the player can even see the steel space station engine through the space.  However, the interior environment of the space station is indeed a vibrant farm. In the space composed of gravity in four directions: up, down, left, right and center, there are distributed the player's cabin, the player's pet cat Meowmeow (and of course our old friend), various farm animals, wooden carts, dog kennels and so on. We moved the farm town on Earth into this Meowmeow Space Station, and made adjustments to gravity that you would never imagine: in this space, players can walk on the walls, and even the ceiling!

Put your VR headset on and enjoy this impossible environment of Meowmeow Space Station!

Our Github repo link (you can build the VR rig by yourself):  https://github.com/JasmineMeow/VR-Inception.git
